channel.title: Sierra Nevada on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Sierra Nevada on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: US-50 East - Echo Summit
item.description: US-50 each at Echo Summit -Elevation 7382 Feet. This is the summit of the Sierra Nevada on US-50 and the divide between the American River drainage and Lake Tahoe, which drains to the Truckee River.

item.title: US-395 North - Sierra Nevada Pass Information
item.description: Sierra Nevada mountain pass information on US-395 north. This sign shows the status of CA-120 (Tioga Pass), CA-108 (Sonora Pass), and CA-89 (Monitor Pass). At the time this picture was taken, the only pass still closed was Tioga Pass.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 21
item.description: I-80 west at Exit 21 - Greg St./Vista Blvd. This is the first exit in the Reno/Sparks area westbound. The Sierra Nevada are visible in the background of the photo.
